title: Odi oLivadEnO
sahitya:
Odi oLivadEnO shrI rAmA un matimukha darishanam tara varAdA


anupallavi

  tEDittEDi manam vADi vADi ninnai nAdi nADi nALum pADip-paNindazhaittum


caraNam    unnai ninaindE unmattamAnEn bandham viDuttEn pArum marandEn
 un porpadAmbujam enran shatamena vandaDaindEn innum EzhaikkirangiDAmal
